bbrl_gymnasium >= 0.2.3
bbrl >= 0.2.11
bbrl_algos >= 0.0.2
bbrl_utils >= 0.10.2
mazemdp >= 1.2.3
box2d
box2d-kengz
importlib-metadata==4.13.0
pyglet<2
torchdiffeq
ipyreact >= 0.4.0

# STK race
pystk2-gymnasium == 0.7.*

# Use a recent moviepy version
moviepy >= 2.1

# For SIREN
scikit-image >= 0.24.0
